objectives.hint: Purchased from the Awakened Merchant near the Grand Sahil Casino using one Candy Corn Cob.
objectives.name: Joko's Crown (Replica)

objectives.hint: Found in Palawan Phylacteries, dropped by champion Awakened. Easiest method to acquire them is to complete the Awakened Invasion events in Central Tyria.
objectives.name: Awakened Officer's Service Medallion

objectives.hint: Found in Buried Treasures and Superior Buried Treasures, found by using a Treasure Hunting Kit in one of the Crystal Desert maps.
objectives.name: Mummy Wrap Field Kit

objectives.hint: Speak to the Mad Spirit in the north on the wall of the Labyrinth maze, who will give you this item.
objectives.name: Journal of a Youth

objectives.hint: In Mad King's Raceway, south of waypoint, in mausoleum on a hill.
objectives.name: Chariot Reins

objectives.hint: In Mad King's Raceway, southwest of waypoint, in small mausoleum.
objectives.name: Joko's Book Club Selections

objectives.hint: The book is within an Abandoned Lockbox near the top of the ruined building at the point of interest.
objectives.name: Book of Palawa Poetry - 1st Draft

objectives.hint: The item is in the Abandoned Lockbox.
objectives.name: The Scourge of Vabbi's To-Do List

objectives.hint: On top of the Joko Statue at Great Palawa Joko Monument.
objectives.name: Aphorisms of Joko, the Eternal Monarch of All

objectives.hint: In an Abandoned Lockbox under the Joko statue's foot.
objectives.name: A Treatise on the Veridical...

objectives.hint: In an Abandoned Lockbox in the Forbidden Vault.
objectives.name: The Diary of Palawa Ignacious Joko
